channel.title: PlayActionX 5 server community
channel.description:
Welcome everyone and please read what is in this post. So lets get started.
PlayActionX Is a community being built on 5 servers to provide something for everyone to play. These server and their developments will be posted and updated below. The servers we will have are PlayActionX Classic (Runescape classic style obviously), PlayActionX 2006(2006 style runescape), PlayActionX Spawn(A spawn server not yet sure if it will be old graphics and old items of hd graphics and new items.), PlayActionX 562(A server in hd 562 for people who like updated graphics and gameplay.), And lastly PlayActionX Forever(A server that is running right now which can be seen at our website.)
Website - [url=http://www.playactionx.com/]http://www.playactionx.com/[/url] Youtube - [url=http://www.youtube.com/playactionx]http://www.youtube.com/playactionx[/url] FaceBook - [url=https://www.facebook.com/Playactionx?ref=hl]https://www.facebook.com/Playactionx?ref=hl[/url]
[i]The Server's Developments[/i] red means not started Orange is in progress Green is completed
[b][u]PlayActionX Forever(Online Already)[/u][/b] - All 21 skills complete.(Might add hunter.) - Party room with balloons. - Perfect void armour effects(must be wearing the whole armour for full effects. - Pefect effects for all barrows armours(If wearing full sets from each brother.) - Perfect bzerker necklace effects with the tzhaar melee weapons. - Spirit shield effects. - Castle Wars Minigame - Some modern spells that don't work in most rsps. - Typical things like godwars, chaoos ele, barrows, pest control, ect. - Corporal Beast - Pvp Armours + Chaotics(maul, rapier, longsword.)
[b][u]PlayActionX 2006(Offline)[/u][/b] Let me explain this one real quick. Your Probably think seriously another re-make. come on. Well Your right, thats what this basically is but we are not going to rush our product like everyone else and we are not setting any dates for any releases just so our community will be lied to unlike some other places we know. So lets get to it!
- [b][u]Free To Play (Only this for now, enough for beta stage.)[/u][/b] - All F2P npcs added. - All F2P shops added(Will complete this quick.) - Perfect Clipping - All Ladders, Doors and Global Drops(Items on ground that you pick up and they respond after a period of time. - Combat System complete! - All Npc drops with perfect rates.
[u][b]Cooking[/b][/u] - All Fish - All F2P Foods
[b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]
- Pottery - Leather - Dragonhide Leather
[b][u]Firemaking[/u][/b] - All Logs - Fire removing/global - Clipped Autowalk
[b][u]Fishing[/u][/b] - Catching Fish - Random Events
[b][u]Mining[/u][/b] - Mining All Ores - Obtaining Gems - Pickaxe Requirements - Rune Essence
[b][u]Prayer[/u][/b] - Bone burying - Protect Prayers/Deflect Prayers + effects - Prayers - Clothing
[b][u]Runecrafting[/u][/b] - Rune Essence - Talismans - Runecrafting Altars - Crafting Runes
More to come!
[b][u]PlayActionX Classic(Offline)[/u][/b] - Basically A Classic Re-make.
[b][u]PlayActionX Spawn(offline)[/u][/b] You tell us whether we should do rshd or a old school spawn!
[b][u]PlayActionX 562[/u][/b] A server with newer items and graphics as you all should know if you know anything about rsps. I will update this one when the time comes.
Thanks for reading and we hope we see you soon! Don't forget to post feedback even if its harsh. Lastly We want you to pick the spawn server for us. Tell us whether old school spawn of rshd spawn.

item.title: PlayActionX 5 server community
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

LOL AT WEBS.COM!!!

Don’t use that.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayActionX 5 server community
item.dc:creator: @ray_ray_1101 ray ray 1101
item.description:
@ray_ray_1101 wrote:

thanks for the advice. I want this to go good. I’m trying my best.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayActionX 5 server community
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“ray ray 1101, post:4, topic:469380”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=586556.msg4164255#msg4164255 date=1353511889]
The formatting in this thread makes me wanna kill myself.
[/quote]

I understand. Not so good with this kind of stuff. I mean the posting wise. Thanks for the feedback.

Also ruby Know1 knows who i am really, but i plan to work my way to being know. I have programmed for a few years now secretly. Also we have a few people working right now. I’m not sure how many people we will go for. I’m not trying to rush anything. This won’t be done over night.[/quote]

The only advice I could give you is take it slow, work on one thing at a time. Have a few administrators control the development team, have 2 or 3 developers working on each base; even more if you’re creating your own framework. Don’t give anyone access to the files who you don’t trust.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayActionX 5 server community
item.dc:creator: @ray_ray_1101 ray ray 1101
item.description:
@ray_ray_1101 wrote:

[right]The BBC[/right]

haha true. I’ll try to do better. Updated And Made Cleaner.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayActionX 5 server community
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

How many developers are you planning on having for 5 servers all from a different era? That’s going to take some very knowledgeable people from each of those eras in RuneScape and some pretty talented programmers.

Read full topic

Welcome everyone and please read what is in this post. So lets get started.

PlayActionX Is a community being built on 5 servers to provide something for everyone to play. These server and their developments will be posted and updated below.            Well Your right, thats what this basically is but we are not going to rush
